name: JamFever
description:
Welcome to the submission of my first game in the game jam! I'm so excited to have the opportunity to participate in Kindred's game jam and showcase my work. This game has been a labor of love, and I've put a lot of time and effort into making it the best it can be. I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed creating it. Thank you for considering my game for the game jam. I can't wait to see what you think!

Introduction

In this game, the main character is a sandwich who must stay alive through waves filled with enemy fruits. To defeat the enemy fruits and collect more Jam, the sandwich character can shoot jam bullets from its jam jar. The goal of the game is to collect as much jam as possible and stay alive until the end of the game. There may be power-ups and other items that the sandwich can collect to help it on its journey.

How To Play

W A S D  - Move

Right-click - Dash

Esc - Pause

Credit

Music: https://pixabay.com/vi/sound-effects/cute-music-26476/
